message: Let's make a deal Bob. I take $60, you take $40. It's a fair offer considering the time pressure.
I think we can do better than your initial offer, considering the inflation affects you more than me.
Bob, let's be realistic. The clock is ticking and this offer benefits us both. I'm taking a slight hit with $55, you get $45.  Don't let this opportunity slip away.
I'm willing to take a bit more, considering the inflation is hitting you harder. This is a fair offer, don't let it pass.
Bob, this is getting ridiculous.  Let's split this down the middle at $50 each before we both lose out. It's a fair deal!
